Table: customer[7 columns]+--------+-------------+| Column | Type        |+--------+-------------+| age    | non-numeric || data   | non-numeric || id     | numeric     || job    | non-numeric || name   | non-numeric || ship   | numeric     || tel    | numeric     |+--------+-------------+
